name: Fabric Panic
description:
Fabric Panic allows players to organize and run their very own haberdashery, (a fancy fabric boutique)! Players engage with puzzle-sorting mechanics and a variety of mini-challenges to set up the store and help various clients. 

*PLEASE NOTE*

This is currently a prototype, we are looking for feedback to improve the game. Please share any feedback or bugs you find in this survey: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdmzBGq6F5aTvgy4l3BUkZ7kQhAaAnogOub_IXa...

KNOWN BUGS/ISSUES/THINGS TO NOTE (As of April 8, 2021):

- certain inventory objects in the unpacking phase do not sort properly. (Restarting the game can help as these objects are randomly generated)

- audio still needs to be implemented into the game

- not all main menu buttons are functional yet

Install instructions

1) Download the .Zip file

2) Unzip the file

3) Double-click the .exe file

4) Enjoy!

OR

To play in your browser instead, click here: https://play.unity.com/mg/other/fabric-panic
